attributes.action: Due to the Lockdown at Gatwick causing Major Issues from ‘Drones’ License them.
attributes.additional_details:
There are always the Idiots who spoil things for the many, have heard cases where they invade households Privacy by flying close to windows, due to how Dangerous they are Children must not use them over over Properties, there is the risk of taking out Power Supplies.

Needs sorting ASAP before the Fact.
attributes.background:
Should be an age Restriction on them with Only Licensed holders using them, they must be abled to be traced with an identification.

The Penalty Must be much Higher as it’s playing with peoples Lives and very Likely to bring a Plane down.

The country will be having Terrorists use them
